page.title: 08RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: Being a rural area most recreational activities have to be done on a self-help basis i.e. run by local people for local people. CHILDREN-The girls have a Brownie pack for those aged between 7 and 10 years meeting normally on Wednesday evening in the school.The boys have a Boys'Club meeting on Tuesday evenings also in the school,this is run by the local police constable and two fathers.The school Parents' Association run occasional Discos partly as a fund raising activity but mainly as a fun activity.The School, through the Parents' Association arrange swimming instruction classes on Thursday evenings at a swimming pool in Carlisle and in the summer term they book the Longtown swimming pool for family swimming on Monday evenings.
